programme.title: 2025 Formula Drift
programme.desc: When mixing the speed of 1,000 horsepower with precision one gets the spectacle of Formula Drift.

programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series West Returns to St. Louis as Cole Venard looks to lead the Black Pearl to a Freestyle win at The Dome at America's Center.

programme.title: 2025 Monster Jam Primetime
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series West is back at Angel Stadium in Anaheim for Round 2 of the Monster Jam season. Ryan Anderson looks for his second straight event championship while Todd Leduc attempts to ride the freestyle winning wave to an overall event championship.

programme.title: 2025 Monster Jam Primetime
programme.desc: Primetime visits Stadium Championship Series East down in southern California for Round 3. Grave Digger's Tyler Menninga looks to remain undefeated in racing, while Camden Murphy debuts his brand-new ride, Classroom Crusher.
